SARAH_JOHNSON: Sarah Johnson, Owner of The Coffee Spot

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.description: We use cookies to ensure the security of our platform, improve user experience, and collect usage statistics. You can manage your preferences anytime.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences, log-in status, and measure usage..

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
strictlyNecessary.description: Required for core functions like login, account management, and form submissions. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site using tools like Matomo or Google Analytics. These are anonymized.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your settings such as language or region.

managePreferences.title: Managing Your Preferences
managePreferences.description: You can change or revoke your consent at any time by clicking the ‚ÄúManage Cookies‚Äù button at the bottom of the page.Additionally, you can control cookies directly from your browser settings.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security & Privacy
dataSecurity.description: We never use cookies to collect sensitive personal data. All analytics are anonymized and stored securely. See our full Privacy Policy for more.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically. Last updated:

cookieModal.title: Manage Your Cookie Preferences
cookieModal.description: We use cookies to personalize your experience...

header.title: Tips & Best Practices for Cyber Helpers

content.intro: Welcome to the Cyber Helper Resource Center. This guide will use essential best practices to help you provide high-quality and effective security diagnostic services. By following these guidelines, you can ensure that your work is professional, ethical, and secure, while also ensuring excellent client satisfaction and cybersecurity protection.

communicate.title: Communicate Clearly and Respectfully
communicate.p1: Strong communication is the foundation of a successful diagnostic process. Always aim to introduce yourself clearly, explain your process, and set clear expectations with the client. Respond to inquiries promptly‚Äîideally within 24 hours‚Äîto maintain momentum and show professionalism.
communicate.p2: Your role is to advise and guide, not to dictate. Act as a partner to the client. Many organizations may not have deep cybersecurity knowledge, so be patient and avoid using overly technical jargon. Remain neutral, focused, and objective during all conversations. Ask open-ended questions and encourage active collaboration to explore their challenges in detail. Be respectful and patient‚Äîyou‚Äôre not just solving a problem, you‚Äôre building trust.

privacy.title: Protect Data and Ensure Privacy
privacy.p1: As a cyber helper, you‚Äôre trusted with sensitive information; it‚Äôs your duty to treat that data with the highest level of confidentiality and care.
privacy.p2: All communications and data should occur through the Samory Mini-Atlas Cyber platform‚Äôs secure channels. Do not store or process client data on your personal devices or computers. Only access and work with information directly on the platform and never download it to personal devices beyond the duration of the engagement. Once your report is submitted, delete any local copies.

reporting.title: Diagnostic Reporting Best Practices
reporting.p1:
‚Ä¢ Use the Official Report Template
‚Ä¢ Summarize Before Diving Deep
‚Ä¢ Provide Proofs and Screenshots

faq.title: FAQ‚Äôs
faq.q1: How do I request a cybersecurity diagnostic?
faq.a1: You must first register your organization, create your profile, and then request a diagnostic through your dashboard. Once you‚Äôve submitted your request, it‚Äôll be reviewed by our team before being assigned to a Cyber Helper.
faq.a2: Yes, all diagnostics are free! Our mission is to democratize cybersecurity by offering essential services at no cost to clients and providing a platform for cyber helpers to gain experience and contribute to the community.
faq.q3: How long does it take to be assigned a Cyber Helper?
faq.a3: Assignments are usually made within 48 hours, but this can vary depending on the complexity of your request and the availability of suitable Cyber Helpers.

report.title: Report Misuse or Abuse
report.subtitle: If you've experienced harassment, inappropriate behavior, or any abuse of the platform, please use the form below to report it confidentially. Our team takes every report seriously and will take appropriate action.
report.confidentiality: Reports are confidential. Misuse of this form may result in account suspension.

form.reportedEmailError: Reported user email is required and must be a valid email.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe what happened in detail...
form.descriptionError: Description is required and must be at least 20 characters.

success.title: Thank you! Report Sent Successfully
success.subtitle: Your report has been received and will be reviewed by our team.

association.subtitle: Support your local community by helping spread cybersecurity awareness and guidance.

organization.title: Organization Details

terms.label: I confirm that I am authorized to submit this form on behalf of the association and agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

benefits.title: Who Can Register?
benefits.description: Associations, NGOs, or community organizations working to promote digital citizenship and security can become a relay association. Once registered and approved, you can get free resources and can participate in cybersecurity awareness efforts.
benefits.point2: Help connect citizens with cyber helpers
benefits.point3: Host or support local awareness events
